profile:
The Home Improvement People have completed literally thousands of renovations since our inception. We are a unique award winning contracting company, consulted by various media as industry experts. 
Please view our website at homeimprovementpeople.com to view images of some of our projects. 
For our clients' convenience, we've implemented progress billing as well as financing.
Regardless of scope, we approach every single home renovation with a foundation of strong design aesthetics, comprehensive product options, sound project management, and a commitment to craftsmanship.
 
Our projects range from remodelled bathrooms and kitchens, to rear additions,  hardwood flooring, basements, second story additions and other extensive renovations. We undertake work in all budget ranges.
 
Choosing a reputable contractor is the most important decision you will make regarding your renovation. From plans and permits, to last little finishing details, The Home Improvement People is committed to completing your renovations and home improvements in a professional manner and to your complete satisfaction.
We take pride in our personalized service and our high quality workmanship. 
Call us for quality, insured work - completed on time, and on budget.
416-782-7605.

profile:
P&P General Contractors Inc. is a family owned and operated business with excellent references provided by many satisfied customers.  With more than 15 years of experience and many satisfied customers our company is strongly committed to provide high quality of craftsmanship to each and every customer.

P & P General Contractors Inc. is a licensed company and for our customer's protection we carry both liability and worker's compensation insurance on all our workers and subcontractors.  We are a start to finish company and we stand behind all projects performed and backs them with a full 1 YEAR WARRANTY.

We take pride in our perform, thus our customers can always be assured that only the most experienced and qualified people are serving them.  Our top priority is our customers satisfaction and our teams objective is to transform your renovation wish list into a reality.

AGM Renovations experts provide quality basement and Bathroom Renovation services throughout the GTA and the surrounding area. See our Service Area for the complete list of towns where our  renovation services are offered. We offer 100% satisfaction guarantee on our workmanship and offer competitive prices with exceptional quality.

Expect more and when you need the best; trust AGM Renovations. We guarantee that you will be completely satisfied, which means that you don't pay until you are satisfied.
Our mission is to be committed to excel in the work we do. We are committed to excel and maintain a sense of pride in our all we do!

services:
AGM Renovations offers Complete basement and Bathroom renovations packages from the professional design through the professional cleaning including:

Drywall- We employ only professional drywall installers and our goal is deliver complete satisfaction to each and every client with the quality of our workmanship and our prompt, reliable service.
    
Taping- Our drywall taping techniques will bring a high quality smooth finish, with a level of excellence you will take pride in.

Painting- We include all wall priming, painting of ceilings, baseboards, casing, crown and cove moldings into our basement construction packages
    
High Grade Laminate Flooring- is standard in our basement renovations packages.

Tiling- Shower, bathroom, or kitchenette tiling will be done by professional tile installers who are employed directly by AGM. A 2 year unlimited warranty is provided to you standard when you finish your basement with AGM
   
Plumbing- Our licensed plumbers will ensure that no problem is left unsolved and you can be sure that any drain or other plumbing defects left by the original house builder will be fixed effectively.

Electrical- We are committed to providing fully licensed electrician service as part of our standard package. Should you ever require an electrical certificate when you decide to sell your property, we will be happy to provide it to you

profile:
Timeless in style, dependable in performance and exceptional in design, look to Rockstella Stonery to craft the perfect granite, marble or quartz countertop for your home or office. A natural option for kitchen countertops, bathroom vanities and tub surrounds, these materials are also excellent alternatives for fireplaces, bar tops, reception desks and more. We handle all aspects of design, fabrication and installation, and are always prepared to take on a variety of projects, from single vanities to full-scale home installs to multi-unit projects.

***

We distinguish the caliber of our work at Rockstella not just through outstanding craftsmanship and affordable pricing, but more importantly, through an unparalleled level of service. We’ve earned a reputation for being timely, approachable and efficient, and we always plan our consults and installs at a time that suits your schedule – whether it’s business hours, weekends or after hours. It also bears pointing out that we work directly with you – there are no sub-contractors involved – from on-site measuring to individual slab selection to professional installation.

***

At Rockstella Stonery, we like to refer to the unique style and design of our stone options as affordable luxury – an option that will stand out in your home or place of work and that will endure for ages. We’re based in Stoney Creek, and are ready to provide our services to clients throughout Hamilton, Niagara region and GTA.

profile:
Techno Kitchen Refacing is an Ontario based kitchen renovation company that specializes in refacing, rather than replacing. Recently, we brought on another member to the team to supply the increasing demand. Now, we can serve you faster, and across a larger area.

Techno's word-of-mouth marketing philosophy shows how happy customers have been with the product. Honesty and customer satisfaction are of the utmost concern for Techno and the customer will benefit every time.

Want to see it for yourself? Our customers are so happy and enthusiastic about the work that they've allowed us to invite you into their homes to see firsthand the quality of the work. Call today and ask how to arrange a meeting with Frank.
service_area: Stoney Creek, Hamilton, Grimsby, St. Catherine's, Niagara, Welland, Burlington, Oakville, Milton, Georgetown, Halton Hills, Caledon, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto, Etobicoke, Scarborough, North York, Markham, Ajax, Pickering, Richmond Hill, Oshawa, Vaughan, Woodbridge, Barrie, Muskoka, Kitchener, Cambridge, Waterloo, Guelph, Ayr, Orangeville, Flamborough, Waterdown
hours: Tuesday to Friday 10 am - 5 pm Saturday 10 am - 4 pm
products:
Why Choose Techno?
Full Satisfaction Guarantee! Real wood doors and veneer in several different stains, colors and species! No plastic, no paper, no cheap looking laminate! We're a member of the Better Business Bureau! You work directly with the owner who will be personally involved in making your dream kitchen a reality!
services: Cabinet repainting, cabinet refacing and custom-built cabinetry and entertainment units.
specialities:
*WE SPECIALIZE IN REAL WOOD*
After 15 years of experience in the woodworking and cabinetry industry, Techno founder Frank Silletti chose to start his own refacing company with the goal of giving homeowners in Ontario a more affordable alternative to traditional kitchen remodeling. Frank says "By using the cabinet refacing process, we are able to dramatically cut down the time, cost and inconvenience of building and creating your dream kitchen". With the experience and the motivation to back his work, you can be sure Frank will be there to answer any questions or concerns to deliver the best value and quality of work available. Please feel free to visit the contact page and fill out an information request form. We look forward to hearing from you!
name: Techno Kitchen Refacing

profile:
If you want QUALITY, CREATIVITY, RELIABILITY, and an overall ENJOYABLE experience, Purple Properties is the company you're looking for! For nearly 24 years now we have grown to understand what is needed in our market space, now allowing us to service happy clients all over the GTA.  

We have enjoyed producing an impressive body of work, lead by the Vision of our clients. The results naturally happen based on our core principles of PASSION, EXCELLENCE, & COMMITMENT. Our work and knowledge base is extremely diverse. We love to use STONE, HORTICULTURE, WOOD, TILES,  PAINTS along with other materials that become our art, your property being the canvas. Whether your project is interior or exterior, we can help! We look forward to co-creating with you in your next project! 

Purple Properties is fully licensed, insured, and up to date with WSIB. Our insurance and license are valid in the GTA for Interior and exterior projects.

profile:
The Home Improvement Group is the premier One Stop Shop for all of your home and office renovations needs.  We have multiple divisions such as Perfect Painter, Affinity Renovations, Perfect Handyman and formally  Mr. Rescue to service all your needs. 

We service work form $400.00 to $500,000.00+ from our Painter and Handyman of the Day Service to  Home Additions and Major Renovation and Structural work.   We want to earn your trust and as a family owned business that delivers on providing outstanding home/office renovation work. 

Not convinced we have enough renovation reviews please see Perfect Painters & Home Renovations Services for a more detailed list on reviews.

We have a commitment to Quality work and dealing with a no risk contractor and we will always compete for your business.


We have also expanded our service areas to include Burlington, Oakville, Milton, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto, Vaughan, Markham, Newmark, Aurora, Stouffville, Pickering and Oshawa.

Call or email us at sales@thig.pro for all your renovation needs

We also have Master Electricians, Master Plumbers and Gas and HVAC members as a part of our team.

profile:
If you want QUALITY, CREATIVITY, RELIABILITY, and an overall ENJOYABLE experience, Purple Properties is the company you're looking for! For nearly 24 years now we have grown to understand what is needed in our market space, now allowing us to service happy clients all over the GTA.  

We have enjoyed producing an impressive body of work, lead by the Vision of our clients. The results naturally happen based on our core principles of PASSION, EXCELLENCE, & COMMITMENT. Our work and knowledge base is extremely diverse. We love to use STONE, HORTICULTURE, WOOD, TILES,  PAINTS along with other materials that become our art, your property being the canvas. Whether your project is interior or exterior, we can help! We look forward to co-creating with you in your next project! 

Purple Properties is fully licensed, insured, and up to date with WSIB. Our insurance and license are valid in the GTA for Interior and exterior projects.

Process:

Call for free estimate: 416-899-1572

Please visit our website at: www.purpleproperties.ca


Service area Keywords: Landscaing, Renovations, Kitchens, Bathrooms, Additions, Gardens, Design, Decks, Permits
GTA Home Additions, GTA Renovations, Toronto Home Additions, Toronto Renovations, Toronto Kitchen Renovations, Oakville Kitchen Renovations, Burlington Kitchen Renovations, Mississauga Kitchen Renovations, Vaughan Kitchen Renovations, Toronto Bathroom Renovations, Oakville Bathroom Renovations, Burlington Bathroom Renovations, Mississauga Bathroom Renovations, Vaughan Bathroom Renovations, Oakville Landscaping, Burlington landscaping, Mississauga Landscaping, Toronto Landscaping, Toronto Landscaping Companies, Vaughan Landscaping,

Free consultation, recommended design and material options. (Cost for drawings if applicable.)

Written contract will be provided prior to commencement of work.

Our Services Include:
Any Interior and Exterior makeover we design & build, whether its a new kitchen, bathroom, basement, addition, cabinetry, Interlocking & natural stone, Trees and shrubs, flooring, painting, drywall, plumbing, electrical, concrete, asphalt, exposed aggregates, irrigation, carpentry, carpet installation, retaining walls, fences, waterfalls.

profile:
For 25 years, Canlik has been the premier Kitchen Refacing Specialist in Greater Toronto Area. It's kitchen upgrade solutions are custom to fit individual family needs, New Kitchens or Refacing Kitchens, they are more personal, flexible, affordable and environmental friendly. Since 1990, Canlik’s principal has been the same – delivering high quality products and services. No pushy sales. Consultants focus on providing honest and unbiased suggestions so that home owners can make the right decisions. Kitchen projects can be overwhelming and confusing – but it does not have to be if customers chose Canlik Kitchens. 
 
Details on our solutions: - 
 
(A) Kitchen Refacing,
Canlik’s very popular "Premier Kitchen Refacing” aims at delivering custom kitchen looks with fraction of the cost. It uses the existing infrastructure and replaces exterior elements, like the cabinet doors, gable and fillers. It reduces wastage and helps avoid hidden costs. Kitchen Refacing solution has been providing great alternatives for those who want to achieve their renovation goals with less effort, less risk and have their budget under control.
 
(B) Custom New Kitchens 
“Canlik Custom Kitchens” allow home owners fully utilize limited spaces because cabinets are custom built to fit spaces. It can handle challenging space issues that "Modular kitchens" can hardly address. It also makes preserving the existing layouts and the foot prints possible, so that the flooring and other elements are not affected. Storage efficiency is achieved by detail oriented cabinet configurations design and adding effective accessories, if necessary.

profile:
Paint Core Finishes is a custom refinishing company. We provide top-notch kitchen cabinet, vanity, woodwork and furniture re-spraying, refinishing and painting services in the GTA.

Reclaim your kitchen cabinets, vanities, and woodwork!

We believe in doing things right the first time. We specialize in the fine art of cabinet refinishing, painting, re-spraying and wood finishing. If you have a tired looking kitchen and are thinking of replacing it, think twice. We have salvaged hundreds of kitchens with our factory finish process. We pride ourselves on producing high quality finishes on all your existing cabinetry, millwork and furniture. By implementing a very thorough preparation, combined with the right application systems, topnotch equipment and coatings we provide amazing results. This is our recipe for success!

Our philosophy is that a refinished kitchen shouldn’t look refinished; it should look like it was bought that way.

_________________________________________________
 
Green Maple Home Renovations is focused on providing high –quality service and customer satisfaction.  It’s success comes from hard work, honesty and a feedback between contractor and customer on all stages of each project. 
 Renovating a house could be a stressful experience.  So, why renovating?
Because we make it easy for you and because just a kitchen, bathroom or a basement renovation will increase the value of your home for future sale or simply  to make your home more comfortable to live in now.
Our team will guide you through this process to make it a smooth and memorable renovation experience. 
 From frame to finish, we do it all . No matter how big or small your renovation project is, we're the company for the job. We are proud of our countless satisfied customers. Choose us for any renovation project, and you'll be glad you did.
 We would welcome the opportunity to earn your trust and help you to transform your living space delivering superior construction and design.
 
Why Green Maple? 
 
We are specialists in Kitchen, Bathroom and Basements Renovations.
 
We start with a consultation to map out your vision, requirements and budget for the projects. From there, we will develop a plan of action for the project and discuss a time frame.
 
Because we want you to feel involved throughout the entire project, you are welcome to get in touch with us at any time.
 
We will explain you what’s going on as the project takes shape, and discuss problems reasonably and will work with you to make the result as good as it can be.
 
We have the technical, business and interpersonal skills, the tools and the experience needed to do the job you want done. 
 
We have experience with projects similar to yours and we know what materials and techniques are needed for your work; and even better, about problems with similar work and how to solve them.
 
We are willing and able to help you refine your plans where possible, resulting in a more desirable and cost-effective project. 
 
We are knowledgeable about the type of work you’re doing and able to suggest ways to get what you want and meet your budget.
 
Before starting the job we will give you a fixed price which includes all the materials, labor, equipment and fees and will put everything in a signed contract.
 
From the initial consultation to the last service, we keep you abreast of our progress so you know exactly what we are doing and how much it costs. 
 
We know how to work efficiently with as little inconvenience to you as possible while still delivering a final product that surpasses your expectations.
 
We will give you one year warranty on all work and if during a year there's any issue we will fix it in a frame time of 24-72 hours after the first call .
 
Our professionalism, affordability and reliability have helped us build a client base that knows that we do not sacrifice quality for price.  
 
Our Company is committed to working within the budget of your project, ensuring that your renovation is completed on time delivering a high quality result.
 
We are also an Eco-friendly renovations company and we can help you to low your energy costs! 
 
Give us a call..! Our best proof of quality is satisfied customers.

We're social here:
https://www.facebook.com/GreenMapleHomeRenovations/

profile:
Since 1973 Olympic Kitchens Inc has been a family run business providing timeless cabinetry for custom dream home builds and home renovation projects.  At the center of these projects is always a stunning kitchen but we bring our expertise and quality to built-ins, bathrooms and specialty millwork. 

Now that you’re thinking about a new kitchen, you certainly want the breathtaking results you may have seen online and in pictures. But a truly beautiful kitchen is more than skin deep. Real value for your investment includes things like classic styling that will stand the test of time. A company that understands and can deliver current trends and advanced products. Flexibility that lets you put your personal stamp on your own kitchen design. Hand crafted cabinets that look as good up close as they do from a distance. Durable surfaces that stand up to repeated cleaning. 
 Functionality that makes things easy to store – and easy to find.

We’re proud to say that Olympic Kitchens Inc. can offer you all these things, and more. We’ve learned a thing or two over 45 years of building custom cabinetry. Most important, we’ve learned that true satisfaction with a kitchen occurs on many levels – and ¬that each level must be addressed right from the beginning to ensure it exceeds expectations. Our clients include custom home builders, architects, interior designers and renovation contractors who understand ﬁne work, and who recommend us to families like yours.

Services Provided
Custom Bathroom Vanities, Custom Cabinet Doors, Custom Cabinets, Custom Kitchen Cabinets, Custom Walk-in Closets, Drafting, Floor Plans, Green Building, Home Additions, Home Extensions, Kitchen Design, Lighting Design, Sustainable Design, Kitchen Remodeling

Areas Served

profile:
Dear  Customers, Dear Friends
 
Thank you very much for your support, warm feedbacks and all references that we are getting from you. 
We are here to serve you and will gladly accept the opportunity to exceed your expectations. We are so passionate about the quality of our work and the treatment of our customers, we want you to know just what you can expect when you buy your marble or granite counter tops from Marble Treasure.
 
    The reason we are in business is to serve you.
    Your concerns, needs and desires are our top priority.
    You are not dependent on us; we are dependent on you.
    Your inquiries are not an interruption of our work; they are the reason for it.
    You do us a favor when you call and we feel privileged to serve you.
    You represent an integral part of our business; just like our staff.
    You tell us what you want and we will strive to fulfill that want.
    You are the client. It is not our place to argue with you but to see that you are satisfied.
    You are deserving of the most courteous and attentive treatment we can provide.
    You are our lifeblood. We exist to exceed your expectations.
 
Sincerely,
 
Marble Treasure Inc Team

Monday –Thursday 10am-7pm
Friday from 10am-6pm and Sat from 10am-4pm

profile:
Why choose The Renovators of Canada?  
 
For over the past 20 years our focus on customer experience has helped The Renovators of Canada grow to locations in Durham, Aurora, Stouffville, Markham, Vaughan, Toronto, Hamilton, Guelph, Kitchener, Waterloo, Barrie, Oshawa, Oakville and Cambridge. 
 
Unique to the industry, The Renovators of Canada provides a 10 year warranty on all craftsmanship. This home renovation warranty protection was established to provide peace of mind as home and business owners contemplate renovating a personal or commercial space. 
 
T-ROC is a fully licensed and insured including WSIB. Other affiliations include memberships with the National Kitchen and Bath Association, CARAHS, Better Business Bureau.  
 
We have a proven track record working with our customers with full transparency in every aspect of your project.  Can’t be present all the time during the renovation process?  No worries, we have specialized client software that allows you to see the entire schedule and pictures as the project happens in real time. We care for your home like it’s our own and always conduct ourselves respectfully and professionally.  
 
With our motivated and innovative professionals we will transform your house and make your dream home a reality.  Visit our website at www.trocanada.com

.
WE ARE THE TEAM OF PROFESSIONALS WHO PERFORM KITCHEN, BATH OR BASEMENT RENOVATIONS ACCORDING TO YOUR PERSONAL PROJECT.
.
Our major activities are renovating basements, kitchens and bathrooms at reasonable prices. Trusting such works to us our clients have convinced in their quality and fast performing. Quality and efficiency. We provide preparing and performing works as soon as possible.
Years of experience. We are in the renovation services market for many years and have an excellent reputation and hundreds of grateful customers.
Individual approach. We approach responsibly to perform each order and find the best options for the task as well as advise customers in order to meet all their individual needs.
Highly qualified specialists. We are a team of professionals and perform our work efficiently and reliably. Our employees keep their skills always according to the up to date requirements.
Customers positive reviews. We have a lot of positive feedback from the customers.
.
.
Basement renovation:

Basement in a private house more often perceived as a technical room: storeroom for garden tools or a cellar to store the harvest. Meanwhile, the basement is easy can turn into a full room to organize here, for example, a vinotheque, bar, home theatre or billiard room. The kitchen in the basement is also becoming a very popular modern solution. Construction and repair of the basement or ground floor, of course, will transform your home by adding not only the living space but also personality.

The following work can be done during the basement renovation.

Waterproofing. This is necessary if the moisture on the room walls revealed.

Heating. If the room is designed for staying long (kitchen, library, bathroom), it should be warm enough in any case.

Thermal insulation. This feature will save on heating and prevent heat loss into the ground and it will greatly enhance the energy efficiency of the whole building.

Lighting. If the basement has a small level above the soil it can be equipped with energy-saving windows. Additional electric light point sources using LED lamps will be created as well.

Soundproofing will be installed if the basement room contains equipment that generates big noise (e.g. water pumps etc.).

Water supply and sewerage. These works are performed accordingly to the local water company. Additional pumps can be installed if necessary.

Networks for the power supply, LAN or television can be laid, so it will provide you with maximum comfort.
.
.
Kitchen renovation:

The kitchen is one of the most visited places in your house. That is why it is so important that this room should be cozy and functional. We will do for you all kinds of our works for any areas of the rooms, from small to large ones. These will be the following:

1. Replacing the wires.

2. Aligning the surfaces of the ceiling and walls.

3. Laying the floor and wall tiles.

4. Floor, ceiling and general kitchen equipment installation.

5. Kitchen windows replacement.

6. Home appliances integration.

We always use safe and easy to wash materials.
.
.
Bathrooms renovation:

We are trying to renovate the bathroom as soon as possible because we well know this room is essentially the most important thing in your home. This type of repair involves the following:

1. Initial preparing the room, dismounting the wires, old tiles and plumbing communications.

2. Installation of new wiring, plumbing pipes, risers.

3. Preparing the walls, floor and ceiling.

4. Installation the new door and windows.

5. Installing the tiles on the floor and walls.

6. Installation of the new ceiling and lighting.

7. Installation of new connections to the water supply and sanitation.

8. Installation of all sanitary equipment and electric wash machine if needed.

We work at any time convenient for you. We are looking forward to meeting you!
specialities: Kitchen Renovation; Bathroom Renovation; Basement Renovation; Full House Renovations

profile:
Gala Renovations was founded with the concept born out of two sound principles: client-centred design and impeccable customer service. Whether your space is wide open with room to imagine, or small and cozy where we have to be creative, we will work with you to ensure that your renovation is completed exactly the way you want it. Our process starts with the ideas and vision you have for your home and moves to our team who will create plans that will guide our craftsmen to build the home of your dreams.


We specialize in complete home, ground and second floor renovations but we also take on other projects like basements, attics, custom kitchens, bathrooms, wall units, and storage solutions. We are flexible and collaborative in our approach and we care about the details that will ultimately beautify your home. At Gala, we leave no stone unturned in the journey from concept to reality. Our passion and knowledge paired with your dwelling and vision, will culminate in a one-of-a kind, unique space that you can proudly call home!

Jiang's Home Renovation Inc consists teams of true hardworking Asian employees. 

Our main values are customer satisfaction and best quality jobs.

We specialize in: 
* Full House Renovation -> approximately 2  -3 months from basement to third floor
* Full Basement renovation (From start to finish approximately 4 weeks)
* Bathroom/Kitchen Refacing (New backsplash,vanity,cabinets, counter-tops installation)

* Vinyl, Hardwood, Engineered wood or Laminate Flooring

- send us a picture or two of the design you want, we will communicate, help design and work with your budgets in order to achieve expected maximum result.

* Ceramic, Porcelain or any other types of Tile Installation - 100% flat/level result
* Vinyl, Hardwood, Engineered wood or Laminate Flooring 
* Interior and Exterior paintings include rooms, ceilings, garage doors, windows,doors, deck and fences. 
* Crown Moulding, Drywall, concrete repairs, Gutter cleaning /windows/doors caulking or re-caulking 
* Lights/furniture dissemble and re-assemble  
We have expanded and own a crew of professional team doing exterior jobs: Backyard landscaping, New fencing, Decking, Interlocking at a very satisfactory price.

profile:
Capable Group 

Residential Renovations Toronto:-
 
Professional residential renovations can breathe new life into your Toronto home. Whether you are seeking renovations to just one room, the whole house, the exterior or the interior, The Able Group can provide you with everything you need from design to planning to execution, with our building supplies in Toronto.
 
Whether your renovation requirements are something very practical such as updating an outdated kitchen or whether you would like to splurge on a home theatre room for your basement, The Able Group are prepared to take care of your residential renovation needs.
 
Construction Managment:-
We have developed a very comprehensive Construction Management service that has resulted in exceptional projects for countless clients. Please take a minute to review the following information to better understand how we can reliably deliver your project on-time and on-budget.
 
Basement Renovation:-
Of all home renovations, kitchen and basement remodels offer the best financial return. But there’s a caveat with basements: the quality of the new space must match the rest of the house to warrant asking for a higher selling price.

Top Renovations is a highly professional construction business based in Toronto, offering 30 years of experience and workmanship to residential and commercial clients all across the GTA. profile:
Hello prospective client! Thank you for stopping by. 

Top Renovations is a highly professional construction business based in Toronto, offering 30 years of experience and workmanship to residential and commercial clients all across the GTA. Top Renovations primarily specializes in services such as interior home renovations including, but not limited to full kitchen, bathroom, and basement renovations. In addition, demolition, framing, remodelling, flooring, tiling, painting, carpentry, and finish carpentry are also provided. 

If you are interested in receiving a free quote for your project, please do not hesitate to give us a call anytime at 647-622-4409. We look forward to working with you to create the home you have always dreamed of!

profile:
The Preferred Home and Bath (PHAB) family works to improve the quality of life of our customers in the form of well-designed, well-planned, and well-executed interior renovations. We strive to create trusted, ongoing relationships with our customers that see them through every life stage of home ownership from their 1st home reno to their forever home.

PLANNING AND PERMITTING
Preferred Home and Bath has decades of experience with the Ontario Building Code and will always follow its principles by default.

DESIGN
Our designer will first create your space, to scale, in 3D so that you can collaborate on the best possible layout for your lifestyle. Guided material selections will help you create a warm and inviting atmosphere that matches your personal style.

PROJECT MANAGEMENT
Our project managers have years of hands-on construction knowledge that pair perfectly with modern project management techniques to create a seamless process that always produces a happy customer. We value our continued relationship.

Experience generations of expertise, flawless workmanship, and customer service excellence. For over thirty years, we have used our eco-friendly synthetic turf products to enhance our clients’ spaces.

As one of the key pioneers in the synthetic turf industry in Canada, our passion is providing our clients with spaces where they can relax, enjoy and play – safely and worry free!

We are experts in golf turf, and have worked with some of the most prestigious golf courses in Toronto, GTA and York Region. Our understanding of golf playability is unmatched, and we have worked with golf clubs like Diamond Back in preparation of multiple sites hosting the Canadian PGA Championships.

As irrigation specialists, we understand how to properly deal with water and drainage so you don’t have to. When working with any outdoor element, drainage is one of the most important things to consider and do correctly to get the results you want.

Above all else, we are dedicated to delivering the highest quality products combined with our superior installations and outstanding customer service.
name: Synturf Inc.

profile:
Custom Kitchen Interiors with Premium Service.
------------------------------------------------
Kakoz Kitchens & Custom Cabinetry is a family owned business with years of experience in kitchen design including creation, installation and remodeling. Kakoz Kitchens has one of the broadest and most versatile ranges of classic and contemporary kitchens on the market. We serve all of the Greater Toronto Area including Toronto, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Brampton, Hamilton, Etobicoke, Scarborough, North York, Vaughan, Ajax, Pickering, Whitby, Oshawa, Markham and Richmond Hill.
.
Wide Selection of Styles, Cabinetry and Doors ______________________________________________________________________
Whether you are considering timeless simplicity, classic elegance or Victorian style, you will be delighted by the range of beautifully handcrafted options available to you at Kakoz Kitchens. In solid wood with thoughtful detail evident in every piece of cabinetry, the practicality of the designs enhances the modern technology within. We also offer a large variety of door styles, which all come in a wide range of woods. We will make your kitchen the heart of your home, a place where you will enjoy creating meals and socializing with your friends and family.

profile:
Yorkville Design Centre has been an exclusive Downsview Kitchens retailer since it was established in 1972.  Known throughout the world for its fine craftsmanship, attention to detail and lasting value, YDC specifies Downsview Kitchens.

From our Toronto showroom in Yorkville Village, the team at Yorkville Design Centre assists you with your design needs as a designer of kitchens, bathrooms, wardrobes, media rooms and more, including space planning and architecture. Depending on your specific needs using Downsview Kitchens cabinetry, our team at YDC is able to custom design for you. 

Design Process 
We book a consultation with you to go over your space planning needs in either a new build or renovation and then measure and draw up conceptual ideas for your new space in 3D. We bring the ideas into CAD and prepare accurate quotes for our Downsview Kitchens cabinets based on our consultation with you and the design we create. You can engage additional services from Yorkville Design Centre when you purchase your cabinets from us. Then we also provide you with interior design services to finish the space including shopping for the right products and periodically reviewing completion of the envisioned design. 

Products 
Downsview Kitchens cabinetry, countertops, backsplashes, hardware, lighting, plumbing fixtures, appliances, wall coverings, windows, flooring, trim details, molding details.

Services Provided
3D Rendering, Architectural Design, Architectural Drawings, Bathroom Design, Building Design, Custom Homes, Floor Plans, Home Remodeling, House Plans, Kitchen Design, Kitchen Remodeling, Laundry Room Design, New Home Construction, Space Planning, Construction Drawings, Bathroom Remodeling, Interior Design, Building Remodeling, Quotations

Toronto, Annex, Baby Point, Bayview Village, Bennington Heights, Bridle Path, Deer Park, Distillery District, Don Mills, Forest Hill, Harborfront, High Park, Hillcrest, Hoggs Hollow, King City, Lawrence Park, Leaside, Leslieville, Long Branch, Lytton Park, Moore Park, North Toronto, Playter Estates, Port Credit, Port Lands, Roncesvalles, Rosedale, Scarborough Bluffs, Summerhill, Swansea, The Beach, The Kingsway, Trinity-Bellwoods, Thornhill, Seaton Village, Wychwood Park, Yorkville

profile:
Renovations For You By Us, says it all. We take your home and make it everything you want it to be!

Our step-by-step renovation planning will guide you through the entire process, from our initial design, all the way through to completion. You will provide us final sign-off on your Floor Plan, Selection List, Payment Summary and Renovation Contract before we begin. We encourage your input, ideas and guidance every step of the way!

We specialize in all things residential.  Whatever you're looking for: basement, kitchens, bathrooms, bedrooms, tiling, framing, drywall, flooring; top to bottom, we will have your home looking it's absolute best!

With three equal managing partners, you have three primary contacts for your renovation. You can speak with any of us, at anytime, 7 days a week. If one of us is with another client, simply call or email one of our other partners and we will get back to you asap.

Darryl, our Chief Contractor and Design Operator, offers over a decade of contracting experience.  With expertise in all things residential contracting, he will be at your home every day working and overseeing the entire process.  Darryl's motto is simple: I'm building it like I'm living in it.

Jason, our Chief Executive Officer, has been a Realtor for the last 18 years and also grew up in the industry, allowing him to offer the guidance and advice to help your home not only look its best, but also worth as much as possible.

Kate, our Chief Administrator and Design Consultant, runs the day-to-day operations of the entire company, but also provides a much needed different perspective for designs and plans.  She will be there to guide you from the beginning stages of planning, right through to the last nail being hammered.

No hidden costs, ever! The price we give you in our Renovation Proposal and Renovation Contract will not change unless you make an amendment after each is signed.

Additionally, we ask that you hold back 10% of the final cost of the entire project for 45 days after completion. We do this because we stand by our work, we know it is of the highest quality, and we want you to be 100% sure you are just as happy with our work, as we are when we finish.  That last 10% isn't due until the 46th day after your renovation is complete, so that you have time to enjoy our work and see it's quality.  If for any reason there is a deficiency with our work, we will be back within 48 hours to remedy it!

profile:
The services we offer range from fresh decor updates to ground up new construction projects. We specialize in architectural finishes, space planning, light planning, art curation, and furniture and decor. Our clients appreciate the design process which is uniquely catered to them and their personalities and creates an elevated, more enjoyable, way for them to live or work in their space. We inspire our clients to reach outside the box and go further than they imagined by introducing creative and unique concepts.

HOW IT WORKS:

INTRODUCTION
Get in contact and we’ll send an online form that helps us understand your needs. We’ll also ask for any existing photos, plans, Houzz Idea books, and Pinterest board links. The more info you provide, the better!

PREPARATION
If you like, we’ll research ideas beforehand to review at the consult. Otherwise, we’ll develop ideas together with you “on the spot” when we meet.

THE CONSULT
Together with you (on a video conference or in our studio), we’ll review concepts and solutions to solve your design dilemmas. Whether your project is construction or decor related, the consultation is tailored to suit your needs.

FOLLOW UP
After the session, we’ll follow up with an email so you know where and how to get everything. If you need additional research afterwards, that can be available as well.

profile:
Dorval Homes is a high-end custom building company specializing in new homes, additions, and renovations in the Greater Toronto Area.  With over 10 years in the GTA, our rich heritage isn’t to be understated – and discerning homeowners and leading architects have come to rely on Dorval Homes for exquisite attention to detail and comprehensive knowledge of master home-building.  

The happiness of our customers is our singular goal.  Creating joy in our customers’ experience is the byproduct of combining our superior building systems with a rugged moral code emphasizing honesty and fairness.  

Dorval Homes is highly conscious of a project timeline and budget and has proven methods for delivering on both.  These advantages are conveyed to each client through a dedicated team and a highly transparent project management process.  

Additionally, Dorval Homes' 3-year warranty reflects our higher level of service after the job is done, as well as confidence in our craftsmanship.  This means that if there is any follow-up work, or request, long after a project has been completed, we promptly take care of it.  Think of us as your long-term, accountable partner.

profile:
About Us
Hausvio Inc is a leading Toronto-based home renovations company. We pride ourselves on our eco-friendly, innovative, and professional approach to all of our home renovation projects. From a brand new kitchen or bathroom to whole house projects, our team works hard to transform your living spaces completely.
​
We believe in a more personal approach to home renovation projects. By working closely with our clients, understanding their goals, and working hard to craft solution-focused designs allows us to create beautifully crafted, functional living spaces.
OUR TEAM
The Hausvio is made of professional, experienced carpenters with over a decade in the industry. Each member is well-known and admired in their field for exceptional quality, attention to detail, and talent. We also collaborate with other local professionals, including Architects, Engineers, Kitchen & Bathroom Designers, Electricians, Plumbers, and other specialized personnel, to guarantee we are providing the highest level of service and care for our clients.

MEET THE FOUNDER
Owner/ CEO Wilson is a Licenced Professional Engineer with over five years of experience in the home renovation field. Wilson is passionate about implementing the best methods and practices to help reduce Hausvio’s carbon footprint.

Hausvio is pursuing a LEED (Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design) Certificate. LEED is the most widely used green building rating system in Canada and across the globe. LEED is a proven and holistic path to addressing climate change. At Hausvio, we’re committed to creating more resource-efficient, healthy, and resilient homes without compromising design aesthetics, quality, or living convenience.

WHY GO GREEN
Protects Our Ecosystem: Efficient Use of Resources & Energy
Healthier Indoor Environment: Improved Quality of Life
Energy-Efficient: Reduced Operational Cost and Maintenance
Lower Maintenance and Operation Costs
Reduces Strain on Local Resources
services:
Our Services
Your home should perfectly reflect your style, taste, and lifestyle. We listen to your needs, goals, and visions and flawlessly align them with the best building practices to deliver the best possible outcomes for your living spaces.
Kitchen
The kitchen is the heartbeat of the home. At Hausvio, we create kitchens that work for your family, design choices, and your way of living. From contemporary and modern renovations to open concepts and traditional styles, Hausvio works with you to create beautiful, functional kitchens that complement your home’s aesthetic. 
 
Bathroom
Create a luxurious sanctuary in your home. Bathrooms are a place where you can relax, refresh, and rejuvenate. Our team has experience remodeling various bathroom styles, including ensuites, power rooms, and main bathrooms. Whether you want to create a spa-like oasis with a thermostatic shower system or just refresh your cabinetry, our team can help. 
Whole House
Let us help you make your house a home. If you need significant upgrades to your living space to make it work for you and your family, we offer complete house renovations. Typically, whole house renovations include major elements like the kitchen, bathrooms, interior finishes, flooring, and mechanical systems (electrical, plumbing, and HVAC). 
Basement
Finished basements add additional living space while significantly increasing your property value. We offer fully customizable basement renovations to fit your needs. Our team can add vital functional living space and much-needed storage to upgrade your lifestyle. To add even more value to your home, talk to us about including sub-flooring, lighting, a wet bar, laundry room, built-ins, and upgrading insulation.
warranty_terms: Yes. 6 Months on Workmanship.  Kindly ask for more details.

profile:
Welcome to Simply Exquisite, we are a construction and renovations general contractor in Toronto, serving the GTA and surrounding areas.

For over 20 years we have worked with property and homeowners providing them with high caliber commercial and home renovation services. We have earned our reputation as one of the best general contractors in the GTA through our trade expertise and professionalism. We are customer-service driven, pay extra attention to details, and deliver a quality product, on time and budget.

We approach every project with this simply promise: Every home renovation, general contracting, and construction project will be Simply Exquisite. That is our guarantee.

Whether you are looking to do a home renovation in Toronto, from kitchen design and renovations, to bathroom remodels and basement finishing, or something smaller like having your kitchen refaced or installing basement heated flooring, you can trust the best construction company in Toronto to give you the peace of mind of a job well done.

We offer award-winning renovation services that come with a 5-year warranty. We provide in-house design services and counseling, free of charge, with a licensed architectural designer. We extend this added value with every one of our projects so that you can be sure that your project will satisfy your needs.

profile:
OUR PROCESS

 

When working with GTCC, you will have access to knowledgeable professionals working cohesively to provide you with a finished product you can be proud of for years to come. We will provide honest answers and insights to any questions or querries you have throughout the process.

First, you will start with a free consultation and estimate. This is where we will go over all of your options and approximate budgets. If you're seeking help with a smaller renovation (kitchen, bathroom, basement), we will provide you a fixed price in this phase.

Should you decide to move forward with us for a custom home addition design paclage, you will then move into the design phase. This is where you will meet with our architects and designers and together come up with a uniquely custom-tailored plan for your new custom renovation or addition.

Once we have engineered drawings for your project, we will then cost the project based on these approved drawings and provide you with a fixed price to execute the work in a timely fashion.

When we have agreed on the scope of work and price the real planning for us begins. We will provide you a project schedule and approximate start and completion date. Product will be ordered and we will be on our way.

Throughout the construction phase of the project, we will be in constant contact with you. We will keep you apprised of any pertinent information regarding your project through email and set weekly meetings.

When the work is complete, we will do a final walkthrough to discuss any potential deficiencies that must be fixed (on our dollar) and hand over the keys to your new home.

profile:
New Concept Contracting Services Ltd. is a family run company which focuses on customer satisfaction and high quality of work. We do all types of residential and commercial renovations.

We treat our customers as if they are a part of our family. We try to provide a smooth experience during your renovations, making it less stressful and not a hassle. We work alongside side our customers to design and give ideas so we can achieve their dreams.

All of our work is completed by qualified professionals, we hold a high standard and will not settle for less. At the end of a project both us and the customer need to be completely satisfied or our job is not yet complete.

Our work is completed within the discussed timeline and budget. We are fully licensed and insured.

We like to hold our heads high and be proud of the work we do, so if you're looking for contractors that you can trust and depend on, it looks like you found them.

profile:
We are specialized in the production of fine kitchen cabinets, custom shelving, and high-end closet storage solutions . We are confident in the products we make, as well as the services we provide, on every project will suit your vision.

20 years of experience
Our 20 years of experience led to remodeling any kitchen, wall unit, home office, or walk-in closet style you like

Whether meeting with you and your family or collaborating with architects, contractors, and interior decorators, we’re here to help you define your scope of work and articulate a vision that’s uniquely yours.


The experienced design team will turn your vision into a reality detailed plan, creating custom solutions that blend form a function to fit all your family’s needs.

Build
Our designs of combining the old and the new world approach to the top of craftsmanship and that mean you can have the best rich design from both worlds for kitchens or bathrooms. We make every piece of cabinetry in our shop in Toronto, Proudly 100% Canadian-made. To this regard, we offer a warranty against defects in materials and/or workmanship for a period of two years under average residential usage.  

Our Values
We believe in building durable and functional cabinetry that will make things easy to store, easy to find, and easy to clean. By choosing to work with us you will get the real value for your investment and your cabinets will look as good up close as they do from a distance.

A & A Home Repair Services was founded by Greg Cherebin.

Greg had his basment bathroom renovated a couple of years ago and felt he was not given the customer satisfaction that should come with using a reputable company. To make a long story short this effected Greg deeply and he decided to build a company to take care of clients and listen to what they are looking for.

Greg Cherebin is well rounded in customer service, and has an extensive knowledge of Basment and Bathroom renovations. 

The TEAM at A & A Home Repair Services focuses on customer satisfaction 100% We understand what makes a client happy. Honesty,Transperancy, Reliability Affordability and Quality.

These areas are key to having a successful business with happy clients.

Call for your free quote today.

We look forward to speaking with you have a great productive day.

Greg Cherebin 647 990 1278

profile:
Hello Viewer! 

We offer full turn key solutions for interiors and exterior renovations for a variety of building types. Working at a range of scales, from custom renovation projects for residential market to adaptive reuse of small commercial buildings. The team lists beauty, practicality, and social and environmental sustainability as essentials for ‘healthier and happier buildings’.  


We specialize in the design and renovation management of a variety of spaces which can differ in size and function.  It is through our free consultation that  a picture is painted on what your project and budgetary requirements are.   We will hold your hand as tight as you require and ensure that we listen to your wants and needs.  Once we have a clear picture of scope and budget, our team will estimate and design your space for you accordingly with years of experience and education backing our every decision.   


There is no project to small and no renovation project to large for us to handle.  
-We work with a variety of agents who have clients moving into their new 2 story properties or condos which have very tight time lines.  We have accomplished full 3 story (including basement) renovations in 5 weeks flats when necessary.  
-We have many recurring clients which use our services for each challenge they face.  If you aren't ready to do a full project in a single swing,  we can help you break down the project into proper stepping stones to spend where necessary and when necessary. 


We are a phone call or email away and would be honored to work with you.

profile:
If you are looking for a trusted contractor for all your renovation needs in Toronto, the search ends here.

RenoPros Home Services is the company to call for professional kitchen, bathroom, basement renovation and other home remodeling services in the Greater Toronto Area.

More Reasons Why Choose RenoPros Home Services?

- Serving the Greater Toronto Area since 1995
- A Trusted Family Operated General Contracting Business in Toronto
- Specializes in Kitchen, Bathroom and Basement Renovation Services
- Team of Highly Experienced Professionals
- High Quality and Cutting Edge Equipment
- Competitive Prices
- Free Estimates
- Your One Stop Shop’ Experience for Home Renovation and Remodeling Services
- Serves Homes, Kitchens, Bathrooms and Basements and other Properties in Toronto & Surrounding Areas

At RenoPros Home Services we are proud to offer a full range of home renovation and remodeling services in Toronto with a special focus on bathroom, kitchen and basement renovations. Your one stop shop’ experience starts here.

We are passionate about improving your space and providing you with your dream home in Toronto. If you are looking for experienced, professional, friendly and innovative individuals then you have come to the right place.

Since our inception in 1995, RenoPros Home Services has been one of the most preferred and recommended renovation and remodeling contractors in Toronto. Our commitment to provide impeccable workmanship at competitive prices makes our company become the trusted contractor of many homeowners in Toronto and surrounding areas.

Our team of highly experienced and trained contractors is knowledgeable and equipped with the latest tools and renovation practices to provide high quality and reliable bathroom, kitchen and basement remodeling services in the Greater Toronto Area.

profile:
Welcome to Arnold Homes Ltd.
Arnold homes Construction has been restoring and upgrading homes on the GTA for over two decade. We work collaboratively with our clients to create their vision with minimum hassle or fuss. Whether working on a deck or single room, renovating a whole house or building from scratch, we plan meticulously, provide clear and honest quotes and deliver on time and on budget.
We have a highly qualified team and work in partnership with reliable and talented sub trades including electricians, painters, ceramic tilers, dry wallers and plumbers. For projects, our core team is further enhanced with support from architects, structural engineers and kitchen and bathroom designers.
Improving your home is a major investment and Arnold homes Construction strives to give you real value for money and unmatched levels of high quality work and satisfaction.

profile:
Rosewood Kitchens is a family owned custom cabinetry company, specializing in creating custom kitchen cabinets, washroom vanities, office cabinets, islands, and bars. With a passion for re-modelling spaces, Rosewood Kitchens is committed to creating beautiful spaces for your home and office using only the best quality materials and skilled craftsmanship. Having over 25 years of carpentry experience, we incorporate the use of the latest technologies and hardware, along with rich woods and textures to create a unique space that fits each client’s needs.

Are You Ready To Make Your Dream Kitchen A Reality? Well, Look No Further! Here At Rosewood Kitchens, Fine Cabinetry Is Revealed As You Look Beyond The Exterior Beauty And Into Its Components, Construction, And Finishing. Every Rosewood Kitchen Cabinet Is Made To Order By Our Skilled Team Members, Whose Focus Is On Crafting Quality Pieces, One Detail At A Time. We Invite You To Explore What Rosewood Kitchens Has To Offer!

profile:
We are a company that operates in the sphere of making customized furniture for the kitchens and other rooms as well. We offer various kitchen cabinets design that differ in size, style, color and functionality and are adapted to the needs of our customers. The furniture we make is very reliable safe and can become the greatest decoration of your home. Our company employs talented designers able to create a beautiful and convenient furniture project and skilled crafts people that will implement those projects thoroughly and with highest quality.

Custom kitchen designs benefits:

The furniture is tailored to the sizes and angles of your kitchen so it’s guaranteed to fit in perfectly
Multiple custom kitchen ideas to select from
Talented designers will help you select the best option for your kitchen redesign and make the appropriate project for you
Our crafts people have extensive experience in producing custom furniture and are skilled enough to make things perfect
We have the showroom where you can take a closer look at different variant of kitchens and select the one that will suit your needs the best
Our experts order only safe and good quality materials for the furniture we make
Custom Made Kitchens will be adapted to the overall design of the house
We adapt to all taste, lifestyles and budgets of our customers
If you need a truly top-notch practical and good-looking custom kitchen design please allow our team of experts do everything possible to help you. We are happy to see our customers maximally satisfied with the results of our work. Our company in operating in the following cities: Toronto, Brampton, Mississauga, Richmond Hill and Oakville. If you are a resident of one of these cities please do not hesitate and contact us for more information. We’ll gladly answer all the questions you may have.

Some services that we offer are, Custom Kitchen Cabinets, Bathroom Vanities, Media and Entertainment Units, Home Office, Library Cabinets, Walk-in Closet, Custom Wineries, Bar Furniture, Laundry Room, Mudroom Cabinets, Wainscoting, Shower Glass Doors

profile:
Welcome to the home of Toronto's oldest condominium refurbishment contractor (founded in 1972), 

Request a complimentary (non-pushy, value-focused) personal consultation to explore possibility around your upcoming refurbishment project by calling (905) 944-1385 during business hours, or completing the form on this page.

During your complimentary refurbishment consultation, we’ll help you with some of the more important elements of your planning, design and build process, including:

✓ Durable material options.
✓ Efficient project workflows.
✓ Budget saving opportunities.
✓ Approximate timelines.
✓ Common mistakes to avoid.
✓ Best practices for minimal disruptions.

And more!

Need a Build Quote?
If you've already got a world-class design ready to go and are looking for a quote to bring it to life, let's talk details and get you some numbers.

In a Tight Spot & Need a Repair?
Do you have some water, drywall, wall covering, flooring, wall or ceiling damage needing some immediate TLC? We can help.

profile:
Welcome
CDA Quality Home Improvements

We’re In Touch With Your Vision
  


We, at CDA Quality Home Improvements, have been in the business of bringing home renovation and décor dreams to reality for more than 12 years.From minor home repairs, to full scale renovations and home additions, our quality driven team with be there before, during and after the project to ensure that you are fully satisfied.First, we meet with you in partnership to determine a needs analysis.  Then we prepare a detailed quotation for the required work along with a time-line for the completion.  After that, we go to work for you and keep you in the information loop every step of the way.Upon completion, along with you, we perform an inspection of the completed work, for your final approval.At CDA Quality Home Improvements, your satisfaction, is our business.

profile:
ABOUT US
 
Contact us for a free consultation or estimate today!
Ultimate Kitchen and Bath Renovation is made up of top-rated Trades and Designers. We render services to home and business owners throughout the Greater Toronto Area (GTA). For over 20 years, we have provided a full spectrum of services to our clients including complete home renovation and business restoration, kitchen redecoration, bathroom remodelling, and basement finishing , as well as, tile and hardwood flooring, electrical and plumbing services, countertops and appliance installations, and customized carpentry and painting services at a reasonable and affordable prices. We are also one of the leading manufacturer of kitchen cabinets and supplier of bathroom and flooring products in the GTA; Making us a one stop shop for any home or business renovation project.
Our clients' renovation needs and desires are our priority. We are committed to work for them to create a truly client-focused experience. Our goal is to insure that our clients' renovation needs and goals are realized within their set financial budget and timelines. As a result, we open the lines of on-going communication and actively listen to our clients' renovation ideas and concerns while paying a close attention to their personal tastes and styles to ensure that the work is completed successfully the first time.
Our distinctive approach to working closely and building relationship with our clients, our highest quality workmanship, our tenacious project management, as well as, our premium products and materials, our dedicated attention to details, and our care for craftsmanship has lead to countless successful projects execution. At the Ultimate Kitchen and Bath Renovation, we seek to guarantee our clients' satisfaction and to fulfill their needs with every project we undertake.
Let our experience and knowledge work for you. Regardless of your project size, we can guarantee your complete satisfaction in every stage of your renovation process. Contact us today to schedule a free consultation and to get a free estimate on your renovation project.
Our goal is your satisfaction.
 
KITCHEN RENOVATION
 
With the changes in Canadians' lifestyles and the structure of today's family, kitchens are more than just a place to cook. It is the heart of the modern home, a focal point of everyday life and entertainment. As the central hub of the home, kitchen renovations are one of the greatest renovation investments. A practical, functional, and aesthetically pleasant kitchen can add up to 30% to the value of a home or business.
 
The degree of customization homeowners' and business owners' desire for their kitchen can effortlessly be attained with our custom cabinetry and our wide selection of finishing materials. From Modern to Traditional styles, from solid wood to MDF cabinets, and from granite to marble countertops, our clients are rest assured that we have the impeccable products and services to suit their kitchen's interior design that they were hoping to achieve from their renovating project.
 
It is possible to have a modern day kitchen that you were hoping for all these years. It only takes the vast knowledge and experience of our kitchen renovation experts to map out a customized plan for you that encompasses a variety of design elements that best compliments your renovation needs and budget, as well as, your existing kitchen space and layouts. Contact us today to schedule your free consultation and get a free estimate on transforming your kitchen into your customized retreat.

Visit our showroom at 2165 Buckingham Road, Unit 3, Oakville, Ont, L6H 0W7

We turn your dream renovation into reality while extracting every dollar of value from your budget – and delivering a level of service unmatched by any other kitchen renovation company in Toronto.

Give us any job and you will be amazed by how we transform a space into something that is not just beautiful, but also more functional. Even a small condo kitchen can look bigger with the right design choices.

It is all about understanding the three Rs of kitchen renovations – remodel, reface, repaint.

profile: HomeReno Direct is one of the most trusted home renovation experts in the Mississauga and surrounding area. We are a family owned business with over 50 years of combined experience. We are a one stop shop, offering you a full turn key service from concept to completion which includes but is not limited to: design, engineering, plans, permit application and renovations. We specialize in Basements, Bathrooms, Kitchens and home Additions. Guaranteed Work: We offer a 2 yr guarantee. Fixed Pricing: You will receive a detailed quotation. Insurance: We carry a $5 million liability insurance policy. Design: Receive a complimentary design for your dream project. Selections: Our purchase allowance model allows you to pick whatever products you like. Quality: We take pride in every renovation Dedicated Project Manger, who will work closely on your renovations. Financing: we will help you with your financing needs. Financing is based on OAC. Visit our website, www.homerenodirect.com or Showroom!

profile:
B&B Design is a family owned company originated from 2011. We offer residential and commercial renovations such as kitchen, bathroom, basements, office and many more home additions. We provide exceptional customer service with honest rates and high quality craftsmanship. Our goal is to make your dreams into reality!

Contact Bold & Beautiful Design
416-434-1638
services:
Basement Renovations
B&B design offers many options to customers in order to ensure that the job is done to code. We recommend inspections for plumbing and electrical work, as well as city permits. B&b is committed to making the customers dream a reality by educating and being realistic about the work they want done.

Bathroom Renovations
Bathroom designs come in many shapes and forms. The most important step b&b recommends about renovating bathrooms is to ensure that the room is mold and water proofed. B&B highly recommends schluter products for all of these needs.

Kitchen Renovations
B&b provides engineers and design consultants to help bring a customers thought into reality. B&b takes pride in properly utilizating all of the space available. B&b provides an array of designs and countertops for competitive pricing to make sure each customer get something beautiful and unique.
warranty_terms: Our company provides one year free of charge for defects of work & materials for all of our installations.

BUILDING TRUST THROUGH QUALITY WORK

Our mission is to work with individuals and businesses across the GTA to build premium quality spaces that are functional and at reasonable prices.
For 20 years, our General Contractors have been recognized as one of the most dependable team in the GTA.
We’ve provided clients with a wide range of services for all their needs. Whatever you have in mind, our professionals work to bring your dreams to life.
